channel.title: Release notes on daSWAG

item.title: > daSWAG release v1.0.0-beta
item.description: This is our first beta release for daSWAG v1. Most important features Create a new daSWAG project and initialize your user management component Add an Api or a Client component to your project. How to install This is a beta release, so it is not available on our usual “stable” release channel. To install daSWAG v1.0.0-beta using NPM: npm install -g daswag-cli@beta Help and bugs If you find any issue with this release, don’t hesitate to:
